document.full_text: spotify, the popular european online music service, has told record labels it will cut down the free music it allows users to access without a paid subscription, according to people familiar with the plan.
document.title: spotify to cut back free music in europe
lines_and_colors: spotify, the popular european online music service, has told record labels it will cut down the free music it allows users to access without a paid subscription, according to people familiar with the plan.
